A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I felt numb and emotionally dead through most of this film. Afterwards I felt gutted. 
I love the first 2 Star Wars films. I really enjoyed The Force Awakens and Rogue One and it looked as if things were really looking after 3 an a half decades. But this? It left me cold and disappointed and with the feeling that Star Wars-as ongoing 'saga' films-is finished.
I don't know how JJ will pick up the pieces of this one\, and make the next.
What a mess.
